title: Cigköftem
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish
description: Food stand inside Limbecker Platz shopping center offering the Turkish dish made from vegetable pate (bulgur, tomato puree, ground chilli peppers, herbs and spices) instead of the traditional meat. The pate comes in slightly spicy and normal (which is already spicy) is also available in take out packages.
